Text: Le Ménagier de Paris (often abbreviated as Le Ménagier, and meaning ""The Parisian Household Book"") is a French medieval guidebook from 1393 on a woman's proper behaviour in marriage and running a household.

<Text: Le Ménagier de Paris:  It includes sexual advice, recipes, and gardening tips.>
